/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and gray, reflecting the architectural style of the city. Trees and power lines add a touch of greenery and urban infrastructure to the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
